member.name: T:RegawMOD.Android.AdbCommand
member.summary: Holds formatted commands to execute through

remarks.para: Can only be created with Adb.FormAdbCommand() or Adb.FormAdbShellCommand()
Can only be executed with Adb.ExecuteAdbCommand() or Adb.ExecuteAdbCommandNoReturn()

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AdbCommand.WithTimeout(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the timeout for the AdbCommand
member.param: The timeout for the command in milliseconds

member.name: T:RegawMOD.Android.Adb
member.summary: Controls all commands sent to the currently running Android Debug Bridge Server

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.FormAdbCommand(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Forms an that is passed to Adb.ExecuteAdbCommand()

remarks.para: This should only be used for non device-specific Adb commands, such as adb devices or adb version.
Never try to start/kill the running Adb Server, as the type handles it internally.

member.param: The command to run on the Adb Server
Any arguments that need to be sent to
member.returns: that contains formatted command information

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.FormAdbCommand(RegawMOD.Android.Device,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Forms an that is passed to Adb.ExecuteAdbCommand()
member.remarks: This should only be used for device-specific Adb commands, such as adb push or adb pull.
member.param: Specific to run the command on
The command to run on the Adb Server
Any arguments that need to be sent to
member.returns: that contains formatted command information

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.FormAdbShellCommand(RegawMOD.Android.Device,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Forms an that is passed to Adb.ExecuteAdbCommand()
member.param: Specific to run the command on
Specifies if you need to run in a root shell
Executable file on to execute
Any arguments that need to be sent to
member.returns: that contains formatted command information
member.remarks: This should only be used for Adb Shell commands, such as adb shell getprop or adb shell dumpsys.

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.ExecuteAdbShellCommandInputString(RegawMOD.Android.Device,System.String[])
member.summary: Opens Adb Shell and allows input to be typed directly to the shell. Experimental!
member.remarks: Added specifically for RegawMOD CDMA Hero Rooter. Always remember to pass "exit" as the last command or it will not return!
member.param: Specific to run the command on
Lines of commands to send to shell

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.ExecuteAdbShellCommandInputString(RegawMOD.Android.Device,System.Int32,System.String[])
member.summary: Opens Adb Shell and allows input to be typed directly to the shell. Experimental!
member.remarks: Added specifically for RegawMOD CDMA Hero Rooter. Always remember to pass "exit" as the last command or it will not return!
member.param: Specific to run the command on
The timeout in milliseonds
Lines of commands to send to shell

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.ExecuteAdbCommand(RegawMOD.Android.AdbCommand,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Executes an on the running Adb Server
member.remarks: This should be used if you want the output of the command returned
member.param: Instance of
Forces Output of stdout, not stderror if any
member.returns: Output of run on server

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.ExecuteAdbCommandNoReturn(RegawMOD.Android.AdbCommand)
member.summary: Executes an on the running Adb Server
member.remarks: This should be used if you do not want the output of the command returned. Good for quick abd shell commands
member.param: Instance of
member.returns: Output of run on server

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.Adb.ExecuteAdbCommandReturnExitCode(RegawMOD.Android.AdbCommand)
member.summary: Executes an on the running Adb Server
member.param: Instance of
member.returns: Exit code of the process

member.summary: Forwards a port that remains until the current instance is Disposed, or the device is unplugged
member.remarks: Only supports tcp: forward spec for now

Local port number
Remote port number
member.returns: True if successful, false if unsuccessful

Pulls a file from the device

member.name: T:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController
member.summary: Controls communication to and from connected Android devices. Use only one instance for the entire project.

remarks.para: is the core class in AndroidLib. You must always call the Dispose() method when finished before program exits.
specifically controls the Android Debug Bridge Server, and a developer should NEVER try to start/kill the server using an

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.Dispose
member.remarks: Needs to be called when application has finished using

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.GetConnectedDevice
member.summary: Gets the first in the internal collection of devices controlled by
member.returns: containing info about the device with the first serial number in the internal collection

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.GetConnectedDevice(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a containing data about a specified Android device.
member.remarks: must be a serial number of a connected device, or the method returns null
member.param: Serial number of connected device
member.returns: containing info about the device with the serial number

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.IsDeviceConnected(System.String)
member.summary: Determines if the Android device with the serial number provided is currently connected
member.param: Serial number of Android device
member.returns: A value indicating if the Android device with the serial number is connected

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.IsDeviceConnected(RegawMOD.Android.Device)
member.summary: Determines if the Android device tied to is currently connected
member.param: Instance of
member.returns: A value indicating if the Android device indicated in is connected

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.UpdateDeviceList
member.remarks: Call this before checking for Devices, or setting a new Device, for most updated results

member.name: M:RegawMOD.Android.AndroidController.WaitForDevice
member.summary: Pauses thread until 1 or more Android devices are connected
member.remarks: Do Not Use in Windows Forms applications, as this method pauses the current thread. Works fine in Console Applications

member.name: T:RegawMOD.ResourceFolderManager
member.summary: Controls Resource Folders for the Namespace

remarks.para: You can use this in your own programs to have a managed resource folder to extract your own files/write data to.
Calling Unregister() deletes the directory and everything recursively in it, and removes unregisters the directory in the manager.

example.para: This example shows how to register a new directory with the , and create a .txt file in the folder.

member.name: M:RegawMOD.ResourceFolderManager.GetRegisteredFolder(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a containing information about the registered resource directory
member.param: Name of registered resource directory
member.returns: containing information about the registered resource directory

member.name: M:RegawMOD.ResourceFolderManager.GetRegisteredFolderPath(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the full path of the registered resource directory
member.param: Name of registered resource directory
member.returns: Full path of the registered resource directory

member.name: M:RegawMOD.ResourceFolderManager.Register(System.String)
member.summary: Registers and creates a temporary resource directory named with the
member.param: Name to give to resource directory
member.returns: True if creation succeeds, false if directory already exists

member.name: M:RegawMOD.ResourceFolderManager.Unregister(System.String)
member.summary: Unregisters and removes the temporary resource directory defined in recursively
member.param: Name of resource directory to unregister
member.returns: True if deletion succeeds, false if not
member.remarks: Make sure all resources in are not being used by the system at time of Unregister() or it will return false.
